title: Christmas Gifts, Facebook Steve Show, Lizzo, Miss Universe and more.
itunes:title: Christmas Gifts, Facebook Steve Show, Lizzo, Miss Universe and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! We are officially 14 days away from Christmas. Uncle Steve gives us tips on holiday gift giving. Big Dog has a huge announcement for The Steve Harvey Nation. Was Lizzo wrong for what she did at the Laker game of nah? Black girl magic is alive and well because for the first time in pageant history, all the winners for Miss Universe, Miss USA, Miss Teen USA and MIss America are black women. Congratulations!!! Impeachment is still being talked about and the crew give their opinion on whether or not it will stick. Christmas is around the corner and we wonder if you have ever given a take a hint gift. Kanye and The Carters are among the names on Forbes list for top earning artists in 2019. Today in Closing Remarks, Big Dog tells us what should be done when one door closes and so much more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! We are officially 14 days away from Christmas. Uncle Steve gives us tips on holiday gift giving. Big Dog has a huge announcement for The Steve Harvey Nation. Was Lizzo wrong for what she did at the Laker game of nah? Black girl magic is alive and well because for the first time in pageant history, all the winners for Miss Universe, Miss USA, Miss Teen USA and MIss America are black women. Congratulations!!! Impeachment is still being talked about and the crew give their opinion on whether or not it will stick. Christmas is around the corner and we wonder if you have ever given a take a hint gift. Kanye and The Carters are among the names on Forbes list for top earning artists in 2019. Today in Closing Remarks, Big Dog tells us what should be done when one door closes and so much more.
